messages.title: A fresh voice for the Southside
messages.content: My whole working life has been dedicated to protecting the rights of workers and their families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet outlines a dedication to job creation and job security, aiming to guarantee a living wage and abolish zero hour contracts.
The leaflet presents a commitment to opposing privatization and supporting the renewal of public services.
The leaflet states a promise to tackle day-to-day issues that matter to the southside community.

issues.economy: Job creation and job security, living wage, abolition of zero hour contracts.
issues.governance: Opposition to privatization, renewal of public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: My whole working life has been dedicated to protecting the rights of workers and their families. I want to be your MP to fight for everyone in Glasgow South.

contactInformation.address: Scottish Labour Party, 290 Bath Street, Glasgow, G2 4RE

images.caption: Eileen Dinning, A fresh voice for the Southside.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The flyer also includes an application section for voters to indicate their voting intention, request a poster, or get involved.
